name: Project 2 IT201
description:
This is a drawing application that allows the user to randomly rotate, change color, and scale of the "paint."

The application also allows you to choose your own color or shape of the "paint."

You have the option to reset the program and to choose if you would like background music or not. You have the option between two songs.

You can also choose if you want to have your "paint" disappear after you draw or if you want it to stay. You can also change the time of the disappearance.
